page.title: 07OLD BUILDINGS,SOMERFORD AREA
page.content: Right next to Great Somerford Church is another old building called the Mount House.This was one of two manor houses in Great Somerford which were built for the two nobles between whom the village was divided after the Norman Conquest.The present owners of the Mount House are Major and Mrs P. Phillips who are the parents of Capt. Mark Phillips,the husband of Princess Anne. In Little Somerford there are also several old houses,one of which we were invited to visit by the present owner,Mr.Clifford.It has a Mansard roof and is built with red bricks.The original beams are still to be seen in the kitchen with their meat hooks. On these hooks joints of meat wrapped in muslin were hung for storage.The original shutters with iron bars are still in place at the windows.
